'''''Ninianne of the Lake''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Tainted Water-Splitting Phantasm|text=Ninianne of the Lake — Rift-Subduing Lake Spirit}}.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Ninianne of the Lake can be found in the north-west of the [[Beryl Region]] on a small islet.
<gallery>
Achievement Ninianne of the Lake Location.png|Map Location
Achievement Ninianne of the Lake Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* Ninianne of the Lake, along with [[Vivianne of the Lake]], are a reference to the {{w|Lady of the Lake}}, a character in the medieval literature {{w|Matter of Britain}}.
